## Quaternion.setAndNormalize() method

Set component values and then normalize the quaternion.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setAndNormalize(x: number, y: number, z: number, w: number): Quaternion;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number | The x component value. |
|  y | number | The y component value. |
|  z | number | The z component value. |
|  w | number | The w component value. |

**Returns:**

[Quaternion](doc/markdown/./base.quaternion.md)

self
